tool_description: Tracks daily skin condition observations and analyzes trends to identify patterns, improvements, or concerns in skin health over time.

skin_ratings.description: Overall skin condition rating 1-10 for each date

specific_concerns.description: Specific concerns observed on each date

product_changes.description: Dates when routine changes were made

external_factors.description: External factors that might affect skin (stress, diet, weather, etc.)

tracking_focus.description: Main aspect to track: overall_health, specific_concern, treatment_response, routine_effectiveness

error_messages: Mismatched data arrays: observation_dates, skin_ratings, and specific_concerns must have same length
Insufficient data: Need at least 7 days of observations for trend analysis
Invalid skin ratings: All ratings must be integers between 1-10
Invalid tracking focus: Use overall_health, specific_concern, treatment_response, or routine_effectiveness
Invalid baseline date: Provide valid date-time format
Date format error: All dates must be valid date-time strings
Too much data: Maximum 90 days of observations can be processed at once
usage: Input arrays of observation dates, skin ratings (1-10), and specific concerns, specify tracking focus and baseline date. Optionally include product changes and external factors for comprehensive analysis.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend: improving, stable, declining, fluctuating

average_improvement.description: Average change in skin rating from baseline

concerning_patterns.description: Identified patterns that may need attention

correlation_insights.description: Correlations between changes and external factors
